original_text: So Jacob went in to Rachel also, and he loved Rachel more than Leah, and served Laban for another seven years.
korean_text: 야곱이 또한 라헬에게로 들어갔고 그가 레아보다 라헬을 더 사랑하여 다시 칠 년 동안 라반을 섬겼더라

sentences.original_text: So Jacob went in to Rachel also
and he loved Rachel more than Leah
and served Laban for another seven years
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 라반에게 또 칠 년을 섬겼다
